thread.title: Great location and impressive service - loved it.
thread.title_full: Great location and impressive service - loved it. - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/West 35th Street, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Memphis_TNSusan
title: Great location and impressive service - loved it.
text: The location was perfect, the hotel was in great shape, and the staff was very helpful. Janis did everything she could to make my stay the best it could be, she was especially helpful with my friends twins and making sure they were happy (not an easy task).
